home.title: Home
home.description: Etijah is a comprehensive cloud-based HR system in Saudi Arabia for managing employee affairs, attendance, payroll, and vacations with high efficiency.
home.keywords: HR System, HR Software, Human Resources Management, Saudi HR System, Attendance System, Payroll Management, Vacation Management, Employee Management, HRMS Saudi Arabia

about.title: About Us
about.description: Learn about Etijah HR System - the leading cloud-based human resources management solution in Saudi Arabia, designed to simplify and automate HR processes.
about.keywords: About Etijah, HR System Saudi Arabia, HR Software Company, Human Resources Solutions, Cloud HR Management

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Discover Etijah's comprehensive HR services including attendance management, payroll, recruitment, performance evaluation, and more.
services.keywords: HR Services, Attendance Management, Payroll Services, Recruitment Management, Performance Evaluation, Employee Management Services

attendance.title: Attendance & Departure Management
attendance.description: Advanced attendance and departure management system with biometric integration, shift management, and real-time tracking for Saudi companies.
attendance.keywords: Attendance System, Time Tracking, Biometric Attendance, Shift Management, Attendance Tracking Saudi Arabia

payroll.title: Payroll & Benefits Management
payroll.description: Automated payroll processing system compliant with Saudi labor law, including salary calculation, GOSI, benefits, and tax management.
payroll.keywords: Payroll System, Salary Management, GOSI Integration, Benefits Management, Payroll Software Saudi Arabia

recruitment.title: Recruitment Management
recruitment.description: Streamline your hiring process with our recruitment management system featuring job posting, applicant tracking, and interview scheduling.
recruitment.keywords: Recruitment Software, Applicant Tracking System, Hiring Management, Job Posting, Recruitment Saudi Arabia

performance.title: Performance Evaluation
performance.description: Comprehensive performance management system for employee evaluation, goal setting, feedback, and development planning.
performance.keywords: Performance Management, Employee Evaluation, Performance Review, Goal Setting, KPI Tracking

orders.title: Order Management
orders.description: Manage employee requests, vacations, leaves, and approvals efficiently with our automated workflow system.
orders.keywords: Leave Management, Vacation Requests, Employee Requests, Approval Workflow, HR Requests

packages.title: Pricing & Packages
packages.description: Explore Etijah's flexible pricing plans and packages designed for businesses of all sizes in Saudi Arabia. Get started with our free trial.
packages.keywords: HR System Pricing, HR Software Packages, HRMS Plans, HR System Cost, Subscription Plans Saudi Arabia

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Get in touch with Etijah HR System team. We're here to help you transform your HR processes and answer all your questions.
contact.keywords: Contact Etijah, HR System Support, Customer Service, Get in Touch, HR Software Contact

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions

faq.keywords: FAQ, HR System Questions, HRMS Help, Support Questions, Common Questions

blogs.title: Blog & Resources

mobileApp.title: Mobile App

mobileApp.keywords: HR Mobile App, Employee Self Service App, HR App Saudi Arabia, Mobile HR Management, iOS Android HR App
